description: The Bonecrusher Grunt is a fearsome orc warrior known for its raw strength and brutality. Often found leading small raiding parties, it relishes in smashing through its enemies with overwhelming force.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a bonus action, the Bonecrusher Grunt can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
